assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: P.D., M.R.B., R.W.P., J.S.P. and J.L. have previously consulted for and received grant support from Eli Lilly and Company. W.F.B. was previously employed by and has equity interests in Eli Lilly and Company. Other authors declare no potential conflict of interest.
